text: Sonny Geraci (November 22, 1947 - February 5, 2017) was an American musician and singer. He was best known as lead singer of bands The Outsiders and Climax. He was also known as Peter Emmett during the 1980s. He was born in Cleveland, Ohio. Geraci died on February 5, 2017 at the age of 69. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1947 births Category:2017 deaths Category:American rock singers Category:Musicians from Cleveland
title: Sonny Geraci
